subject: download Adobe Suite 3 Design
body:
Beware lest you lose the substance by grasping at the shadow.
No one can read with profit that which he cannot learn to read with pleasure.
Wine is a turncoat first a friend and then an enemy.
We are linked by blood, and blood is memory without language.
Courage is fear that has said its prayers.
If you aren't fired up with enthusiasm, you'll be fired with enthusiasm.
To love someone deeply gives you strength. Being loved by someone deeply gives you courage.
Men show their character in nothing more clearly than what they think laughable.
If one age believes too much it is natural that another believes too little.
All work and no play makes one the wealthiest man in the cemetery.
A stumble may prevent a fall.
Any fact is better established by two or three good testimonies than by a thousand arguments.
You can preach a better sermon with your life than with your lips.
There is always a chance that he who sets himself up as his brother's keeper will end up by being his jail-keeper.
I sometimes give myself admirable advice, but I am incapable of taking it.
Acting doesn't bring anything to a text. On the contrary, it detracts from it.
If a little knowledge is dangerous, where is the man who has so much as to be out of danger?
I knew my trainer believed in me and I couldn't let Him down.
Parting is such sweet sorrow.
